docs.lead_paragraph: Adolph J. Toigo has released 75 per cent of his stock in Lennen Newell and relinquished his chief executive title, according to William C. Lyddan, president and new chief executive.
docs.abstract: G Beckstein apptd vp-marketing of USV Pharmaceutical Corp health services div
docs.snippet: Adolph J. Toigo has released 75 per cent of his stock in Lennen  Newell and relinquished his chief executive title, according to William C. Lyddan, president and new chief executive.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 14 -- In a surprise move, Congress passed and sent to the President today a bill requiring most able-bodied welfare recipients to sign up for work or training so as to continue receiving benefits.

headline.main: CONGRESS VOTES TO REQUIRE WORK FOR WELFARE AID; Most Healthy Beneficiaries Would Have to Sign Up for Jobs or Training Congress Votes Work or Training for Welfare Clients

docs.abstract: Cong approves welfare bill that includes provision for Govt financing of 90% of costs of day-care or in-home care services for children of working mothers
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 14 -- In a surprise move, Congress passed and sent to the President today a bill requiring most able-bodied welfare recipients to sign up for work or training so as to continue receiving benefits.

byline.original: By MARJORIE HUNTERSpecial to The New York Times
